name: Distractions (itch) (Tunda)
description:
How to Play:

Cat - Click food container and then click food bowl until full.

Homework - Do 3 math problems.

WIFI MAN - ONLY THE FLASHLIGHT CAN STOP HIM!!!

Description:

It is a high concentration game that is about doing tasks from 7AM to 5PM in game time. There are 3 tasks, and all have a different time constraint for each of them to be complete.
